item.title: How to host a website on local IIS?
item.description: Prerequisites You already have installed IIS on your system.If IIS is not installed then go to Control Panel -> Programs and features -> Turn on windows features on or off Steps Add a new MVC Web application.Here I have added it to the path E:\ Open the IIS by pressing Windows+R and then type inetmgr. Right click on folder Sites and click Add Website Enter the site name as you want and the host name as per your requirement.
